籤詩版本二:
Ka holo ʻana a puni e lanakila ai i nā pōʻino he nui, e lawe ana i ka wai a kauo i nā kānaka e piʻi i nā mauna
Ke nānā nei au i ka ʻāina ʻē no ke kōkua, ʻaʻole au i hoʻi hou mai ma hope o ka huakaʻi ʻana i nā tausani mile.
詩意:
Ua like kēia hexagram me ka huki ʻana i ka lepo a me ka wai.
ʻO ka mālama ʻana i nā mea kahiko e lawe mai i ka pōmaikaʻi.
解曰: Hiki ke hoʻi hope. Paʻakikī ka holomua. E mālama wale. Mai manaʻo e piʻi kiʻekiʻe.
籤詩故事一:
◇ He mea paʻakikī iā Qiuniang ke haʻalele
He kamaʻāina ʻo Du Qiu no Jinling i ka mōʻī Tang.
I ka makahiki 15, ua lilo ʻo ia i haiā wahine na Li Qi (he kipi i ka moʻokūʻauhau Tang).
I ka makahiki ʻelua o Yuanhe (807), ua hoʻokumu ʻo Li Qi i pūʻali koa e kipi. Ma hope mai, ua hāʻule ko Li Qi kipi a ua hoʻokomo ʻia ʻo Du Qiu i loko o ka hale aliʻi. Ma hope mai, ua aloha ʻia ʻo ia e Emperor Xianzong o ka mōʻī o Tang a lilo ʻo ia i haiā wahine.
I ka makahiki ʻumikūmālima o Yuanhe (820), ua hele ʻo Tang Muzong i ka noho aliʻi a hoʻonoho iā ia i keiki ʻo Li Min's Fumu (he kahu hānai kūikawā i ka mālama ʻana i nā keiki o ka ʻohana aliʻi).
Ma hope mai, ua hoʻopau ʻia ʻo Li Min ma ke ʻano he Mōʻī o Zhang, a ua hoʻi ʻo Du Qiuci i kona kūlanakauhale.
I ka wā i maʻalo ai ʻo Du Mu ma o Jinling, ʻike ʻo ia i kona ʻilihune a ʻelemakule ...
(He ʻōlelo hoʻohālikelike kēia moʻolelo no ka minamina i ka ʻino ʻana o nā mea i kēlā me kēia manawa.)
聖意: He maikai ole ka home nona iho, pule no ka waiwai, laki maikai i ke kau a me ka hooilo, maikai ka mare ana, pule no na pomaikai no Liujia, pule no na pomaikai no ka hele wawae, keakea i na mahinaai, ka enuhe silika, maikai ole no na holoholona eono, pilikia i ka imi kanaka, hoopii, ka lilo ʻana o ka pōmaikaʻi, ka lilo ʻana o ka waiwai, ka maʻi, a me ka pōmaikaʻi ʻole no nā hale kupapaʻu mauna.
